skills.name: Heavy Pulse Rifle
skills.description: Soldier: 76’s rifle remains particularly steady while unloading fully-automatic pulse fire.

skills.name: Helix Rockets
skills.description: Tiny rockets spiral out of Soldier: 76’s Pulse Rifle in a single burst. The rockets’ explosion damages enemies in a small radius.

skills.name: Sprint
skills.description: Whether he needs to evade a firefight or get back into one, Soldier: 76 can rush ahead in a burst of speed. His sprint ends if he takes an action other than charging forward.

skills.name: Biotic Field
skills.description: Soldier: 76 plants a biotic emitter on the ground. Its energy projection restores health to 76 and any of his squadmates within the field.

skills.name: Tactical Visor
skills.description: Soldier: 76’s pinpoint targeting visor “locks” his aim on the threat closest to his crosshairs. If an enemy leaves his line of sight, Soldier: 76 can quickly switch to another target.
